item.title: Is it Windy Outside?
item.author: law9723@gmail.com (Lawrence Pilch)
item.description: My earlier experience with Wordpress made me think there had to be a better way to do simple, reliable sites online. A blog is static, meaning everyone sees the same content. Yihui Xie from RStudio created what for my needs is a better way to host content. The web is built with HTML, Javascript and css. Everything boils down to these eventually.
